body.name: Kraus KRM-11BL Multipurpose Over Sink Roll-Up Dish Drying Rack, Matte Black,16 7/8 in. x 12 in.

features: OVER-THE SINK DRYING RACK: Designed to sit securely on the integrated ledge of your workstation sink, this versatile accessory helps with food prep and cleanup while saving counter space – FITS ALL WORKSTATION SINKS on the market, including the KRAUS Kore and Bellucci Series – DIMENSIONS: Measures 16 7/8 in. x 12 in. when fully opened – GENEROUS DIMENSIONS accommodate large items like oversized cutting boards that wouldn’t fit or can’t be dried in a dishwasher
RINSE & DRY produce and stacks of dishes while keeping the mess over the sink and off of your countertops

USE AS TRIVET: Use as a non-slip trivet for hot pots or baking sheets straight out of the oven – PROTECT COUNTERTOPS when you lay it flat on any kitchen surface or tabletop to prevent damage from hot items and serve your meals in style! – HEAT SAFE up to 400 F and ideal for use as an oven mat for roasting or braising meats and vegetables – SILICONE SURFACE prevents food from sticking and allows for easy cleaning

BUILT TO LAST with a stainless steel core and silicone coating, supports heavy pots and cookware – HOLDS UP TO 85 lbs. without warping or bending – EASY TO CLEAN & STORE, this dishwasher-safe drying rack can be rolled up for easy cleaning and tucked away after use

MULTIPLE COLOR OPTIONS AVAILABLE to enhance the look of your kitchen sink with a pop of color and create a modern appearance – 1 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY with top-rated customer service available to support your needs
body.description: Product Description Perhaps the most all-around versatile kitchen accessory, the KRAUS Multi-Purpose Roll-Up Dish Drying Rack is the Swiss Army knife of the kitchen, helping with everything from food prep to clean-up. Designed to sit securely on the built-in ledge of your Workstation Sink, this drying rack allows you to wash produce and dry dishes while keeping the watery mess over the sink and off of your kitchen counters. The universal design fits all standard-sized kitchen sinks and helps you keep countertops free of clutter by making use of the space over your sink. Generous dimensions make this roll-up rack a great tool for drying large items, like baking sheets and oversized cutting boards, that can’t fit or should not be dried in a dishwasher. Heat-safe up to 400 degrees, you can use it as a trivet to protect your kitchen counters and tabletops from hot pots and pans straight out of the oven, or use it directly in the oven for tasks like roasting and braising. The sturdy stainless steel construction with food-safe silicone coating can hold your heaviest cookware with a weight capacity of 85 lbs. This roll up dish rack is dishwasher-safe and easy to clean. Multiple colors available to match your kitchen sink From the Manufacturer For over a decade, KRAUS has been transforming ordinary spaces into extraordinary kitchens and bathrooms, with the goal of bringing quality and value into every home. We focus on designing long-lasting, easy-to-install, low-maintenance solutions that help customers create a cleaner and safer living environment. Best known for kitchen sinks, Kraus offers the best value for your money by using high-grade materials, proprietary technologies, and premium value-added items. We strive to continuously raise the bar in terms of quality, function, and design. Transform your kitchen and bath with Kraus, and experience Innovation for Real Life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my Kohler Stages 45” Wide Workstation Sink
reviews.reviewText: I love my Kohler Stages 45” Wide Workstation sink, but it was *very* disappointing that Kohler failed to offer a custom fit drying rack for this expensive sink. The Kraus drying rack fits perfectly on the inside tracks of the Stages sink, and I’m so thrilled. It seems like a quality product. I like how the size of it covers my 12” sink shelf. The slats of the rack are set closer together, which keeps smaller items from falling through. This makes it more versatile for me. It folds up and stows away nicely. For me, this sink accessory is a necessity, so I’m definitely ordering a backup. Shout out to Kraus, for fixing the Kohler issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tub sinks on kitchen islands
reviews.reviewText: Our kitchen sink is a big, single vessel in our kitchen island. I have always hated having a big, bulky, ugly drying rack sitting there taking up space, collecting mildew, and it seemingly invites piling wet dishes on top of dry dishes. Not anymore! This is really a novel, low-profile solution because it rolls over the sink … and take up sink real estate while things are drying on it. This is actually a good thing! Because it forces me to put away dry stuff more frequently so I can roll the mat out of the way. It works great, is very sturdy (you can put pots and pans on it), is much cooler and futuristic looking than an old wire/plastic drying rack, and it collapses and rolls out of the way wh en not needed. Just a really well-designed product that solves a nagging problem for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this originally for my Kraus work station sink. It folds well and looks sharp. Needed one for my trailer so i cheaped out and bought one without silicone coated bars, which turned out impossible to keep it rolled tight and small. This Kraus folds up pretty narrow and is the right size for the small rv sink. Love that it stays in place, can put a cutting board or hot pans on it and will even work well for draining plates and dishes. Well worth every cent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite kitchen gadget! We use it everyday and it saves my counter. We have a single , deep, farmhouse style sink. Fits perfectly, holds full pots when filling and is easy to clean. The finish is very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and functional too!
reviews.reviewText: I did not know these type of racks existed. I didn't even know to think to wonder, to look for something like them. The companies that make & sell these need to do a much better job marketing.I caught a glimpse of these racks on a vanlife YouTube video, The Queen & Bob, and immediately went online to find them. My sink is HUGE so to get full coverage, I had to buy two. As you can see in images, there is a little overlap. I haven't snipped them to fit perfectly because I'm undecided if I like or dislike the overlap or not. I use these in a camper van and with the silicone coating, I can set things on top, drive, and they don't slide. The overlap by having two racks acts as a stop. If I cut and don't like, then Im buying a 3rd so, I'll wait and see.I like these so much, I bought a 3rd rack to put in the sink, replacing the raised metal rack. The metal rack had hard plastic feet that wee marring the stainless plus the new in-sink rack is coated with silicone too so, I can having things in the sink and drive and the stuff will stay put.I love these Kraus racks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I use it outside the sink to dry stuff.
reviews.reviewText: Works well on my sink, but I just use it as a drying mat to the side. Cleans easily and serves its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space saver
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy this drainer and the space it saves when rolling it up, so far very durable and fits perfectly in my kitchen sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great design and durability. Just wish it came in other sizes such as 17 x 17“
Me encantó, la calidad es muy buena y se ve muy elegante. Definitivamente lo volvería a comprar. Lo amé.

Added a versatile area of countertop surface, good for draining washed dishes, glasses, fruits, vegetables, you name it. Sturdily made with good quality materials.The matt black matches perfectly with my black countertop surface. Yet, it's matt so do not expect to clean to 100% as the water stain will somehow remain.An excellent product all in all.
Works perfectly in a working sink. The dishes dry into the opposite side, saving counter space. Good quality, easy to clean, easy to move out of the bay when needed. 5 stars easy
I love this Kraus dish drying rack. It's very sturdy and attractive looking. The silicon cover over it makes it easy to clean and bright red colour makes it easy to find.
Packaged really well. Good quality. Goes really well with my black sink. Fits perfectly. I love the rubber coating. Works really well. Love it. I recommend this product and seller.
